name: Rescue Action
description:
Background

You are a superhero. You will never die. People are dying in a war, you need to send them to the hospital. The bombs are dropping every 10 seconds, avoid them!

How to play

W/S/A/D - Move

Space - Jump

Left mouse button hold - left hand grab

Right mouse button hold - right hand grab

Resources

Assets

LowPoly Environment Pack - Unity Asset Store

Cartoon Low Poly City Lite - Unity Asset Store

Unity Particle Pack 5.x - Unity Asset Store

Props 3D - Unity Asset Store

Sokpop Skybox Shader
